Ace.description: Combat Start: Your highest Merge Level Troop is the Captain. When the Captain defeats enemy Troops, your team gains +20% Hit Speed (4s)

levels.bonus: Captain gains 60% bonus Damage and gains +30% HP of Damage dealt

Clan.description: Once per round, Clans rapidly heal and gain bonus Hit Speed at 50% HP

levels.bonus: +30% of max HP and Hit Speed
+60% of max HP and Hit Speed for Clans, +30% for team

Goblin.description: You’ll get an extra random Goblin for free next round

levels.bonus: +60% chance of gaining a 3 or 4-Elixir Goblin

Noble.description: Frontline Troops take less Damage while backline Troops gain bonus Damage

Undead.description: Combat Start: The enemy with the highest HP is cursed, and your Undead gain 20% bonus Damage when that enemy is defeated.

levels.bonus: Curses 1 enemy, max HP cut by 25%
Curses 2 enemies, max HP cut by 50%

Assassin.description: Combat Start: Assassins will leap to the enemy’s backline Troops

Avenger.description: Avengers gain bonus Damage, with the last woman standing gaining double Damage

Juggernaut.description: Combat Start: Troops behind Juggernauts gain an 8s Shield

Ranger.description: Rangers gain Hit Speed per attack, stacking up to 15x

Thrower.description: Throwers gain +1 Attack Range and deal more Damage to distant targets
